import React,{useState} from 'react' import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import {connect} from "react-redux"; import { Fragment } from 'react'; const CreateProfile = () => { const[formData,setFormData]=useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', linkedin: '', youtube: '', instagram: '' }); const[dispalySocialInputs,toggleSocialInputs]=useState(false); const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram } = formData; return (

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

* = required field
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
Could be your own company or one you work for
Could be your own or a company website
City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
Please use comma separated values (eg.HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
Go Back
) } CreateProfile.propTypes={ } export default CreateProfile
